title: and Ministerial Functions) Order 2016 (S. I. No. 393 of 2016) (as adapted by
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Environmental Protection
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Environmental Protection 
Agency Act (Registration of Coal Bagging Operators and Solid Fuel Suppliers) 
(Revocation) Regulations 2022. 

(2) These Regulations come into operation on 31 October 2022.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited environmental protection agency act (registration coal bagging operator solid fuel suppliers) (revocation) regulation 2022 (2) regulation come operation 31 october 2022

title: and Ministerial Functions) Order 2016 (S. I. No. 393 of 2016) (as adapted by
heading: 2. The Environmental Protection Agency Act (Registration of Coal
text_raw:
2. The Environmental Protection Agency Act (Registration of Coal 
Bagging Operators and Solid Fuel Suppliers) Regulations 2012 (S. I. No. 454 
of 2012) are revoked in so far as they are not already revoked by Regulation 
10(1) of S. I. No. 571 of 2016. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

26 October, 2022. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for the Environment, 
Climate and Communications. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 28th October 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [539] 3

title: and Ministerial Functions) Order 2016 (S. I. No. 393 of 2016) (as adapted by
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

These Regulations revoke the remaining provisions of the Environmental 
Protection Agency Act (Registration of Coal Bagging Operators and Solid Fuel 
Suppliers) Regulations 2012. Regulations 2 and 3 were revoked by S. I. No. 
571 of 2016. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [539]
